equipId.Wiki: The part to add to the Parts menu.

purchasePrice.Wiki: The purchase cost of the part in the Parts Menu.

unlockFlag.Wiki: The event flag required for this part to appear in the Parts menu.

equipCategory.Wiki: The category this part appears under in the Parts menu.

isBaseAddition.Wiki: This is 0 for the parts added by the 1.0.5 patch. Actual behavior of the field is unknown.

logHunterRankUnlockValue.Wiki: The log hunter rank required for this part to appear.
